channel.title: Tom's Cache Suite Editor [No Virus][WORKS]
channel.description:
1) Well, this has no virus scanned this at least 14 times if not 16. 2) 1 picture, i think you should know how it looks like. 3) I am very new, and i don't know much, if this is in right, since it says Downloads might as well. This is mine had it for about 4 years. 4) Thanks, no spam, or flames my first Thread Post. 5) I am new to Moparscape Only.
[center]Tom's Cache Suite[/center]
Downloads:[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/8200292/Toms%20Cache%20Suite%20-%20Modified.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/8200292/Toms%20Cache%20Suite%20-%20Modified.zip[/url] [Downloads automatically [dl.dropbox]
Media:
Virus Check/Scan [ Microsoft Security Essentials & Malwarebytes ] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2zf234y.png[/img]
Extra Content: 1) Edits Cache 2) Clean (little) 3) I cleaned it was broken. 4) Very Simpler to use. 5) Had a compiler and run changed that :P
[size=18pt]How To Use:[/size]
Click on Tom's Cache Editor Folder. Click on Suite Folder Click on Toms Suite [Jar Sign] Click on File [Top Left] Click on Load Cache Find your Cache.
Once on your Client Folder/Cache. Click on Cache [do not double click, just once.] [If you have no cache just click on your client folder.] And Click Open. If it doesn't work find your cache and redo the steps. [Cache has model.idx and .idx stuff]
If it Loads click on whatever you want.
[Export] It is for if you want to edit it just click it, click the [house] icon and type in [texthere.png] and save it on desktop or wherever.
[Import] It is for if you are done editing your .png click it and click on your .png and done.
[Save Archive] When you are done importing CLICK SAVE ARCHIVE!!!!!
[Note: I made it so it can load up to 560 Cache and some 600 characters. It will take long it is more than 560+!!!, 10 minutes maximum]
I do not own any of this, so don't come knocking on my front door and telling me i am arrested. I only use it for entertainment and helping others in need as i am nice. Thanks =)
My First Topic Thread...

item.title: Tom's Cache Suite Editor [No Virus][WORKS]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Why are you releasing this? K4rn4age already released a version of this that supports any cache size on R-S.

I agree with this, except the link is dead. Tom’s Cache Suite is made to load 317 caches, if your cache is really 200MB, you shouldn’t have packed it with so much shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Tom's Cache Suite Editor [No Virus][WORKS]
item.dc:creator: @Carcool Carcool
item.description:
@Carcool wrote:

  1. Well, this has no virus scanned this at least 14 times if not 16.
  2. 1 picture, i think you should know how it looks like.
  3. I am very new, and i don’t know much, if this is in right, since it says Downloads might as well. This is mine had it for about 4 years.
  4. Thanks, no spam, or flames my first Thread Post.
  5. I am new to Moparscape Only.

[center]Tom’s Cache Suite[/center]

Downloads:http://dl.dropbox.com/u/8200292/Toms%20Cache%20Suite%20-%20Modified.zip
[Downloads automatically [dl.dropbox]

Media:

Virus Check/Scan [ Microsoft Security Essentials & Malwarebytes ]

2zf234y.png800×562

Extra Content:

  1. Edits Cache
  2. Clean (little)
  3. I cleaned it was broken.
  4. Very Simpler to use.
  5. Had a compiler and run changed that

[size=18pt]How To Use:[/size]

Click on Tom’s Cache Editor Folder.
Click on Suite Folder
Click on Toms Suite [Jar Sign]
Click on File [Top Left]
Click on Load Cache
Find your Cache.

Once on your Client Folder/Cache.
Click on Cache [do not double click, just once.]
[If you have no cache just click on your client folder.]
And Click Open.
If it doesn’t work find your cache and redo the steps.
[Cache has model.idx and .idx stuff]

If it Loads click on whatever you want.

[Export]
It is for if you want to edit it just click it, click the [house] icon and type in [texthere.png] and save it on desktop or wherever.

[Import]
It is for if you are done editing your .png click it and click on your .png and done.

[Save Archive]
When you are done importing CLICK SAVE ARCHIVE!!!

[Note: I made it so it can load up to 560 Cache and some 600 characters. It will take long it is more than 560+!!!, 10 minutes maximum]

I do not own any of this, so don’t come knocking on my front door and telling me i am arrested. I only use it for entertainment and helping others in need as i am nice. Thanks =)
